text: Closer to Heaven may refer to: * Closer to Heaven (film), a 2009 South Korean film * Closer to Heaven (musical), a 2001 musical by Jonathan Harvey and Pet Shop Boys ** Closer to Heaven (original cast recording), an album of songs from the musical * "Closer to Heaven", a 1997 song by Mila Mason * "Closer to Heaven", a song from the 1999 album Nightlife by Pet Shop Boys
title: Closer to Heaven
